summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the status of an investigation, likely into Jeffrey Epstein. An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends an updated memo on the investigation to their superiors for review.

persons.name: Roos, Nicolas
persons.context: Copied on an email containing an updated memo on the status of an investigation. Their contact information for the Southern District of New York is provided.

events.title: Investigation Status Update
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney circulates an updated memo on the status of an investigation, which another recipient plans to review that evening and the following day.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain dated August 7, 2019, within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The subject matter is an updated memo on the status of an investigation, with one recipient stating they will 'review Epstein tomorrow'.
The correspondence indicates active review and coordination regarding the investigation at a high level within the prosecution team.
